page.title: 16Local News
page.content: The local newspaper in our area is the {Fraserburgh Herald}which is on sale every{Friday},priced{17p. It is just over one hundred years old, being{founded in 1884.}The present editor is Mr.T Fowler,who helped us with this project. I like the local paper as it tells you about people you may know as well as concentrating on our local area.It includes just about everything you can think of,from sport to local politics and all of the following: Adverts,car sales,poetry (local poets) church notices,round and about,public notices,births,marriages & deaths, properties for sale,local news and events,as well as many other items which come up from time to time. I think everyone should buy the local paper as it is important to know what is happening in your area.
